titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the threshold for the allowance of the deduction for medical expenses.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the threshold for the allowance of the deduction for medical expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce from 7.5 to 2.5% the amount of adjusted gross income over which a taxpayer's medical expenses are fully deductible.
